about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack for Snowflake's Chance by Dante Morris

25 High quality tracks:

01. The Descent
02. Snowflake
03. Trapped
04. Rolling Lava
05. Don't Fall
06. Snowflake's Resolve
07. Tentative
08. Devil Shirts
09. Brick World
10. Bwaoh Buh
11. Scent of Victory
12. Snowflake's Acceptance
13. A Voice From the Trees
14. Forest of the Forgotten
15. Snowflake's Paranoia
16. Forest Moon Endings
17. Reflection
18. Uncertainty
19. The Lower Gate
20. Snowflake's Hesitance
21. Just Run
22. Wired, Wounded and Wary
23. Snowflake's Chance
24. Ascension
25. ...In Hell

All 44khz, 320 kbps mp3

Songs will be placed in your Snowflake's Chance folder in the Steam Directory:
Steam\steamapps\common\Snowflake's Chance\SFC soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 271 MB available space
